name: oic-auth-2.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Ised canada code by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/161
* Bump plugin from 4.48 to 4.49 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/163
* Bump google-http-client from 1.42.2 to 1.42.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/164
* Bump google-http-client-jackson2 from 1.42.2 to 1.42.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/165
* Add checkstyle check by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/166
* Log user without groups if group field is invalid by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/167
* Make flags optionals in JenkinsAsCode configuration by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/168
* Bump test-harness from 1559.v38a_b_2e3b_6b_b_7 to 1569.vb_72405b_80249 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/171
* Bump maven-checkstyle-plugin from 3.1.2 to 3.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/170
* Bump checkstyle from 10.3.3 to 10.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/169
* Add polish localization by @github-actions in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/172
* Make secret optional by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/173
* Improve plugin security by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/174
* Bump plugin from 4.49 to 4.50 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/175
* Bump plugin from 4.50 to 4.51 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/177
* Add configuration to choose origin of root URL (Fix #151) by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/176


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-2.2...oic-auth-2.3

name: oic-auth-2.2
body:
## What's Changed
* JENKINS-61609: Add a fallback parse attempt for groups by @lllmaa in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/90
* Add option to use basic token auth method (#144) by @richardjq in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/121
* Properly restore GrantedAuthorities by @jilyaluk in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/115
* Documentation improvement by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/150
* Extend internationalization and add crowdin link by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/152
* Encode post-logout URL of logout redirect by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/154
* Add French loclaisation by @github-actions in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/157

## New Contributors

* @lllmaa made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/90
* @richardjq made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/121
* @jilyaluk made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/115


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-2.1...oic-auth-2.2

name: oic-auth-2.1
body:
## What's Changed

* Bump google-http-client from 1.42.1 to 1.42.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/138
* Docs migration by @timja in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/86
* Bump google-http-client-jackson2 from 1.42.1 to 1.42.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/143
* Better Support of Reverse Proxy Chains by @jlamande in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/85

## Non-functional Changes

* Bump plugin from 4.47 to 4.48 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/141
* Deeper spotbugs checks by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/135
* Automate dependency updates by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/136
* Publish incremental development artifacts by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/137
* Bump maven-release-plugin from 2.5.2 to 2.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/140
* Bump test-harness from 1.55.1 to 1512.vb_79d418d5fc8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/139
* Allow incremental artifacts by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/145
* Revert version scheme to 2 digits by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/146
* Fix JSR-305 annotations by @michael-doubez in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/147
* Bump test-harness from 1512.vb_79d418d5fc8 to 1559.v38a_b_2e3b_6b_b_7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/148

## New Contributors
* @michael-doubez made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/135
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/138
* @timja made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/86
* @jlamande made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/85

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-2.0...oic-auth-2.1

name: oic-auth-2.0
body:
## What's Changed

- Bump parent version to 4.47
- Support for Java 11+
- Support for Jenkins 2.366+ ( Closes https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/issues/105 )
- Support for Jenkins matrix permission

## New Contributors
* @Skiepp made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/134

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.8...oic-auth-2.0

name: oic-auth-1.8
body:
## What's Changed
* Add i10n support by @LinuxSuRen in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/79
* Use HTTPS URLs in pom.xml by @daniel-beck-bot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/83
* Check for groups in idToken if groups are not found in userInfo by @spirius in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/80

## New Contributors
* @daniel-beck-bot made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/83
* @spirius made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/80

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.7...oic-auth-1.8

name: oic-auth-1.7
body:
## What's Changed
* fallback if endsessionurl is absent by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/61
* Fix: wrong return value of failedCheckOfTokenField by @halftan in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/63
* Fix for #43 by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/60
* Adding exception for CSRF escapeHatch by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/64
* Fixing names, adding @author, removing unused imports by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/65
* Clean the unnecessary condition codes by @LinuxSuRen in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/77
* Fix the incompatible with casc by @LinuxSuRen in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/78
* Look for a known user, or return UsernameNotFoundException by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/82

## New Contributors
* @halftan made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/63
* @jovandeginste made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/82

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.6...oic-auth-1.7

name: oic-auth-1.6
body:
## What's Changed

Special release for [\#46](https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/issues/46) which shouldn't, but might break things - *please report any issues you have with this version here: <https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/issues/62>*

**In case of any troubles revert to 1.5 and report your issues**

* Don't send scope parameter with a token request by @siepkes in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/46

## New Contributors
* @siepkes made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/46

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.5...oic-auth-1.6

name: oic-auth-1.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Use the .well-known/openid-configuration autodiscovery endpoint by @agentgonzo in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/31
* Well known config - bugfixes and improvements by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/32
* #37 Prevents the immediate logout->login loop by @agentgonzo in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/38
* Nested field mapping #34 by @fajran in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/36
* [JENKINS-55654] Fix authentication loop by @Wadeck in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/56
* Fix optional config failing by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/57
* Mask client secret field by @nickpetrovic in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/52
* Nullpointer on nonexistent session  by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/58

## New Contributors
* @agentgonzo made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/31
* @fajran made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/36
* @Wadeck made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/56
* @nickpetrovic made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/52

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.4...oic-auth-1.5

## What's Changed

-   Support for configuring by well known url (/.well-known/openid-configuration) see  also https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-discovery-1_0.html#ProviderConfig
-   fixed issue introduced with Jenkins 2.150.2 with logout occurring immediately after login see: #5
-   Masking client secret to avoid over the shoulder leaking of secret.
-   Nested field mapping - permitting the use of values of non top-level keys,  see  #36  and [OicSecurityRealm.java#L630](https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/blob/6e643be0883b3843876f3522eabb87867677cc83/src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/oic/OicSecurityRealm.java#L630)
-   Returning a 401 instead of throwing an NullPointerException when there's no session at the end of the authentication interaction

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.4...oic-auth-1.5

name: oic-auth-1.4
body:
## What's Changed

* check the userinfo endpoint for group information by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/28
* Use Jenkins proxy information #29 by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/30
*   We can now also look for groups in the UserInfo endpoint when it's configured
*  Added documentation about how scripted clients should authenticate given this plugin is active
*   Now honoring Jenkins proxy settings see [JenkinsBehindProxy](https://wiki.jenkins.io/display/JENKINS/JenkinsBehindProxy)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.3...oic-auth-1.4

name: oic-auth-1.3
body:
## What's Changed
* bugfix for #10 on absent expires_in by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/24


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.2...oic-auth-1.3

name: oic-auth-1.2
body:
## What's Changed
* RP-Initiated Logout by @pdaw in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/11
* Patched TokenResponse of the google oauth-client by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/16
* Add groups at login if provided in the idToken as an array of strings by @DriesVerachtert in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/12
* Making httpTransport transient, preventing it from being serialized - explicitly initializing it after deserilization by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/18
* Adding test harness by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/20
* Fix for JEP-200 issues by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/21
* Implementing escape hatch by @mjmbischoff in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/23
*  Local Login / escape hatch
*  Fix JEP-200 compatibility
*   Added test harness
*  Using role-based permissions
*  Fix for 1.1 breaking on existing configuration and configuration saving issues
*  Add groups at login if provided in the idToken as an array of strings
*  Exception with Azure authority needs testing
*  Patched TokenResponse of the google oauth-client for better compatibility with openid provider implementations
*  On Logout have the option to log out of OpenId Provider
*  Friendlier error when the user declines authorization

## New Contributors
* @pdaw made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/11
* @DriesVerachtert made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/12

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.1...oic-auth-1.2

name: oic-auth-1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Support OIDC UserInfo Endpoint enhancement by @sboschman in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/1
* fix save not resetting userNameField and scopes to default values (bug / User name field value not being updated) by @sboschman in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/2
* Add new setting to disable sslVerification - for testing purposes by @triplem in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/3

## New Contributors
* @sboschman made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/1
* @triplem made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/pull/3

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/oic-auth-plugin/compare/oic-auth-1.0...oic-auth-1.1
